page.title: 12PUBLIC SERVICES IN LEWES
page.content: Lewes is an{administrative centre headquarters of County and District Councils and County and Assize Courts. The prison employs 200.So many people are employed in the{service sector, mostly White Collar jobs.County Hall, a 1960s glass and concrete officeblock towers over the town,its emergency bunker deep underneath, rivalling the Castle as a landmark.{Social Services, {Transport, Libraries, Education,}have their policies decided in Council Meetings at Pelham House. Lewes Town Hall houses the Town and District Councils. The{Ambulance Service}has 14 workers,4 ambulances,answering perhaps 170 calls/week. Eastgate Centre offers psychiatric counselling;Phoenix centre gives day care to handicapped and old. Lewes is proud of its hospital,now under threat of closure from cuts.
